products.title: Stirlo Stone Beige
products.description: Stirlo stone beige plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

products.title: Honey Oak Real Wood
products.description: Ourpremium quality sunwood range ofblinds are one of the leading wooden venetian blind brands in the uk market - we are confident you will not buy better quality blinds, backed by their 3 year guarantee. All blinds are sent with installation instructions, universal bracket (top fix, side fix or face fix) and a pelmet fascia to sit on the front of the blind headrail. Honey oak venetian blinds have been created using all wood product, helping it to achieve a natural beauty within the sunwood collection.

products.title: Shot Silk Pannacotta
products.description: Shot silk pannacotta made to measure roller blind.

products.title: Honey Perfect Fit
products.description: Amid brown shade, thehoney oak 25mm perfect fit blindboasts elegance in any window. Using a patented and extremely easy tool-less clip on system, the perfect fit wooden blinds are a child-safe option, and are both drill and screw free - giving peace of mind that your manufacturers warranty on your windows and doors is not affected. Hand crafted in yorkshire, the perfect fit frame is made from aluminium, with uv-treated plastic corners and, of course, the blind is made from real basswood - giving extremely good thermal benefits to any room as wood is a natural insulator.

products.title: Infusion Asc Beige Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc beige perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.
